wikipedia_page.main: Terence Stuart Eccles (born 2 March 1952, in Leeds) is an English former footballer who played 274 games and scored 77 goals in the Football League playing as a striker for Blackburn Rovers, Mansfield Town, Huddersfield Town and York City. He also had a short stint with the Greek club Ethnikos Piraeus and played in the Conference National for Scarborough.
